rooms.name: Main Courtyard (Nalukettu)
rooms.description: Central open courtyard serving as a communal space with ample natural light and ventilation. Decorated with traditional Kerala motifs.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Expansive living room facing the courtyard to ensure natural light and auspicious energy. Decorated with traditional elements.

rooms.name: Dining Room
rooms.description: Adjacent to the living room for comfortable dining experiences while maintaining a view of the courtyard. Vastu aligned.

rooms.name: Guest Room
rooms.description: Separate guest room with privacy and traditional Kerala aesthetics.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with en-suite bathroom facing the east for energy and auspiciousness as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for family members, ensuring space comfort.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Functional traditional kitchen with integrated storage, located on the west side of the villa.

rooms.name: Dining Utility Area
rooms.description: Adjacent utility space for food preparation and serving.

rooms.name: Home Office
rooms.description: Dedicated home office with natural lighting from the courtyard view, designed for a joint family business environment.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: Grand entrance aligned with Vastu norms to invite positive energy.

openings.name: Side Entrance
openings.description: Secondary entrance for service and emergency access.

openings.name: Courtyard Skylight
openings.description: Strategically placed to enhance natural lighting in the courtyard.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Expanded master bedroom suite with private balcony overlooking the courtyard.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom for guests or family members, ensuring a comfortable sleeping area.

rooms.name: Study/Office
rooms.description: Dedicated study room adjacent to the master bedroom for private work and family consultations.

rooms.name: Storage Room
rooms.description: Utility storage space designed for seasonal items and bulk storage needs.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Access to private balconies for the bedrooms providing scenic views and natural breeze.
